Class ExpandableListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  BaseExpandableListAdapter
      com.group13.hffs.gui.ExpandableListAdapter

public class ExpandableListAdapter
extends BaseExpandableListAdapter

This class provides the adapter to construct the expandable list view for offers

Author:
Aidan, Lucas, Shijian

Constructor Detail

ExpandableListAdapter

public ExpandableListAdapter(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> parents,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> children)
Constructor takes in an arraylist that represents the category titles and then the children that will be displayed in those categories

Parameters:
parents - Category titles when clicked this will expand to show the children
children - the children that are under each category
Method Detail

setInflater

public void setInflater(LayoutInflater inflater,
                        Activity activity)
Sets the inflater to used for the different views that are in the expandable list Also sets the base activity context with the activity param

Parameters:
inflater - from the activity that calls this so that it can create the views needed
activity - base activity used for different functions
